verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> <S%H516>Al-taschith,<s%> <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and they <S%H8104>watched<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> him. <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from mine <S%H4480>enemies,<s%> <S%H341><s%> O my <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H7682>defend<s%> me from them that rise up <S%H4480>against<s%> <S%H6965><s%> me.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the <S%H4480>workers<s%> <S%H6466><s%> of <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> me from <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H4480>men.<s%> <S%H376><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> they lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> the <S%H5794>mighty<s%> are <S%H1481>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me; <S%H3808>not<s%> for my <S%H6588>transgression,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> for my <S%H2403>sin,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
They <S%H7323>run<s%> and prepare <S%H3559>themselves<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> my <S%H5771>fault:<s%> <S%H5782>awake<s%> to <S%H7125>help<s%> me, and <S%H7200>behold.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> therefore, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6974>awake<s%> to <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H898>transgressors.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
They <S%H7725>return<s%> at <S%H6153>evening:<s%> they make a <S%H1993>noise<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> and go round <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> they belch <S%H5042>out<s%> with their <S%H6310>mouth:<s%> <S%H2719>swords<s%> are in their <S%H8193>lips:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who,<s%> say they, doth <S%H8085>hear?<s%>
But <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> shalt <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at them; thou shalt have <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> in <S%H3932>derision.<s%>
Because of his <S%H5797>strength<s%> will I <S%H8104>wait<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> thee: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4869>defense.<s%>
The <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall <S%H6923>prevent<s%> me: <S%H430>God<s%> shall let me <S%H7200>see<s%> my desire upon mine <S%H8324>enemies.<s%>

Slay <S%H2026><s%> them <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7911>forget:<s%> <S%H5128>scatter<s%> them by thy <S%H2428>power;<s%> and bring them <S%H3381>down,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

For the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of their <S%H8193>lips<s%> let them even be <S%H3920>taken<s%> in their <S%H1347>pride:<s%> and for <S%H4480>cursing<s%> <S%H423><s%> and <S%H4480>lying<s%> <S%H3585><s%> which they <S%H5608>speak.<s%>

Consume <S%H3615><s%> them in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> <S%H3615>consume<s%> them, that they may <S%H369>not<s%> be: and let them <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4910>ruleth<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> unto the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
And at <S%H6153>evening<s%> let them <S%H7725>return;<s%> and let them make a <S%H1993>noise<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> and go round <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
Let <S%H1992>them<s%> wander up and <S%H5128>down<s%> for <S%H398>meat,<s%> and <S%H3885>grudge<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>

But <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of thy <S%H5797>power;<s%> yea, I will sing <S%H7442>aloud<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H4869>defense<s%> and <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6862>trouble.<s%>
Unto <S%H413><s%> thee, O my <S%H5797>strength,<s%> will I <S%H2167>sing:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is my <S%H4869>defense,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>
